column2: Only the player becomes a god.
All adult AI independent rulers at peace are elevated to godhood (and sometimes Fallen Gods if the War is on).
All non-god player characters receive the event chain to become a god.
Only the first non-god player character receives the event chain to become a god.
God powers cost the normal amount of piety.
God powers have zero piety cost.
Good and Evil gods exist in a state of perpetual war.
Gods live among mortals, worshipping as they do.  This setting turns off auto-conversion events.
Only Good gods exist.  This setting turns off auto-conversion to Evil religion and Evil God.
Random events to remove personality traits will fire for characters possessing 6 or more.
Doubles the cap for all. Random events to remove personality traits will fire for characters possessing 11 or more.
Doubles the cap for gods. Random events to remove personality traits will fire for non gods possessing 5 or more and for gods for possessing 11 or more.
Removes the personality trait cap for gods. Non gods still have random events fire for possessing 5 or more.
Removes the personality trait cap for everyone.
Gods are immortal, and can only die by battle, assassination, or event.
Gods die from old age just as mortals do.
